name: PNEUS ONLINE
tag_list: tire, tires, pneu, pneus, tires-online, tire-online, reifen, neumaticos, pneumatici, tyres, tyre, banden, opony
overview:
Founded in 2001, PNEUS ONLINE is one of the pioneers in selling tires online for cars and motorcycles in Europe. It is now active in a most European countries as well as in Canada. PNEUS ONLINE has one of the largest fitting stations networkin Europe. From several hundred tires sold in 2002 to several hundreds of thousands of tires today, what had basically started as a small business startup company has quickly grown into an international and dynamic group.

With a wolrdwide vision, in 2007, PNEUS ONLINE branched out and opened its own cars and motorcycles classifieds website and became the first to offer free classifieds on the five continents. PNEUS ONLINE therefore became a key company in the World of car and bikes on the internet. Starting with a few cars to sell, PNEUS ONLINE/Ads is today settled in 47 countries with 25 languages and counts several tens of thousands of classifieds.

PNEUS ONLINE’s success is owed to its philosophy, the one of a company that has always innovated, anticipated its customers’ needs and is always ready to listen to their requests and to serve them. PNEUS ONLINE was the first website in its sector to propose a tire warranty and assistance program. His founder, Alexis NERGUISIAN, states: “Our philosophy consists in offering the best products and services at discount prices in the shortest delivery time possible, constantly considering the quality of service as our main priority.”
